summary:
A small overhaul for Enderal that makes Arcanists Fever more prevalent by adding a cost to all powers and to all spells that the player lacks the required tier of mastery for.
(This mod does some changes to spell names and descriptions which now are in german. If you want to translate them feel free to do so.)

Macht Arkanistenfie
descriptionHtml:
A small overhaul for Enderal that makes Arcanists Fever more prevalent by adding a cost to all powers and to all spells that the player lacks the required tier of mastery for.
(This mod does some changes to spell names and descriptions which now are in german. If you want to translate them feel free to do so.)

Macht Arkanistenfieber zu einem relevanteren Teil des Spiels, indem alle Talente nun einen kleinen Betrag hinzufügen. Desweiteren fügen alle Zauber, die nicht beherrscht werden, Arkanistenfieber hinzu.
Eispranken reduzieren nun Arkanistenfieber leicht wenn verspeist.
author: Erik Messerli
